channel.title: Gf broke leg
channel.description:
My gf broke her leg on her fibula around the ankle. Will be the first time I've been around someone with a broken bones. The only things I know to do are help when needed and be nice even when annoyed. Anything I should maybe bring her to help her comfort? She's got a friend over while I'm at work but I figure id like to surprise her with something nice.
The only thing she wants me to get is several colored permanent markers lol.

item.title: Gf broke leg
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

Treat her like she’s the best thing in your life(even if she’s not w.e. idc) for the night. Make her a dinner or order in i’d recommend ordering in so they don’t expect much in your cooking abilities… n be amazing to them. Pirated movie + a snuggle n then after that me no know cause about then you’d be getting laid but boom broken leg in the way…lul.

Read full topic

item.title: Gf broke leg
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“CoonHunter, post:17, topic:418302”][quote author=Loveandpower link=topic=520848.msg3786092#msg3786092 date=1318887663]
I have given the best advice so far o.0…letting a person watch a movie while they can’t walk is just going to REMIND them that they can’t walk anyway.

You want to do something that will keep her active. Get some crafts or something. RAISE HER CRAFTING LEVEL xD
[/quote]
She is 17, nearly 18. The only ‘crafts’ thing she does is draw lol. She already has an abundance of paper + pencils/colored pencils from her friends that came over. There is really not much the women needs at this point.[/quote]

Ask if she wants to do a puzzle with you or make a scrapbook of memories you guys have had together.

Read full topic

item.title: Gf broke leg
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

xmonster:

instead of birthday sex, broken leg sex.

That made me laugh haha, but OT, just being with her tonight would probably make all the difference to her, just knowing your willing to put down everything to comfort her.

item.title: Gf broke leg
item.dc:creator: @RiiPiiNFtW RiiPiiNFtW
item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

I am in Sports Medicine at school. Just remember the acronym, PRICEM. P for pressure, R for rest, I for icing, C for compression, E for elevation (Make sure its above the heart to reduce swelling, and M for modalities (M isn’t needed if her leg and ankle are casted though).

Read full topic

item.title: Gf broke leg
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

Okay this is what you do…

Cup your hands on her cheeks, peck her on her forehead, tell her that you are there for her, and just say that whatever you need to just tell you, tell her that you want her to feel as comfortable as she wishes and that you are there to just help and support her.

Activity wise, do ANYTHING that will not let her think about the leg. (even though she will think about it always but it’s nice to try to stay off the subject.

p.s. don’t do what I did and ask if you can pet it xD

Read full topic

item.title: Gf broke leg
item.dc:creator: @_N_eon (N)eon
item.description:
@_N_eon wrote:

[quote=“CoonHunter, post:4, topic:418302”][quote author=(N)eon link=topic=520848.msg3784044#msg3784044 date=1318711213]
Rent a movie and watch a movie with her tonight…
[/quote]
Although a good idea for most in my case it’s bad. The closest movie rental place is about a 30 minute ride going 120+ mph on my suzuki lol. I’ll look up something to pirate.

@xmonster - Please be mature, while that sounds great to you, I would rather not have her screaming due to pain, or sleep on the sofa due to trying such an idiotic move.[/quote]

Lmfao at last part…

Anyway, Pirating DVD’s sound gooood.

Read full topic
